channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement hazard - damaged sign, 12th May
item.description:
Sign re cycling damaged and impinging dangerously onto pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 62 Keynsham Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole outside 27 Albemarle Road, 12th May
item.description:
This pothole is getting deeper and wider and is a menace to cyclists - the road is heavily used, especially by pupils going to and from Chosen Hill and Churchdown secondary schools, and Churchdown Village primary. It is also affecting car tyres.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Albemarle Road, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road falling apart, 11th May
item.description:
Road in very poor condition causing vehicles to swerve to avoid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29a Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large hidden pothole, 11th May
item.description:
Pothole on the edge of the road at the brow of the hill as you leave Elkstone
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): High Cross Farm High Cross, Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadside weeds, 11th May
item.description:
This problem in Newcourt Road was reported to CBC almost a year ago. To my knowledge the weeds were never killed or removed last year and are thriving again this year. There was a report of some 'mechanical' weeding device being used in favour of weedkiller but a year late the problem persists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 25 Pinetrees, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge over growing footpath dangerous for children, 10th May
item.description:
The hedge along this section of the road is taking over half the footpath. This is a route to school and makes it very dangerous to try and protect young children from traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Harp Hill, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge over growing footpath dangerous for children, 10th May
item.description:
The hedge along this section of the road is taking over half the footpath. This is a route to school and makes it very dangerous to try and protect young children from traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Harp Hill, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing cover dangerous outside Walton house, 10th May
item.description:
Missing cover dangerous outside Walton house. There appears to be a tap on a pipe at the bottom of the hole. It’s about 2 feet deep and hidden by the grass. If a child slips that leg down the hole while running, they could break it. Please could somebody take a look and call the relevant business to fit a new cover. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Goldsmith Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Endless bad surface on lane, 9th May
item.description:
Since I’ve been using this lane (6years) one or two small potholes have been repaired. There are big missing parts of tarmac that should of been repaired a long time ago
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped furniture, 9th May
item.description:
Blocking path

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 75 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Section of Road Known as Pothole Alley, 9th May
item.description:
This section of road through the trees is full of potholes to the extent that even the potholes have potholes! This has been like tis for some time and really is causing damage to vehicles having to negortiate it. It really is about time that this section of road should be properly repaired. Please can this be done instead of just measuring the depth of holes to see if they qualify!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes at Location - A blind Corner, 9th May
item.description:
Potholes have opened up causing vehicles going up the hill to move away from the nearside to avoid them. This has caused a few near misses as the corner is effectively blind in both directions if a vehicle is in the middle of the road going up the hill. Please can they be filled in
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Lower Hewletts Farm Aggs Hill, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadside parking blocked, 9th May
item.description:
These have been appearing on occasions for the past month now. There doesn’t seem to be any roadworks being carried out. It looks like someone is reserving a parking space and restricting all others. This corner is opposite the School Road Flats at the end of Lyefield Road East.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Lyefield Road East, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins overflowing, 8th May
item.description:
The bins in the vicinity of Central Cross Drive are overflowing. It may be a Sunday but either more or bigger bins are need or they need emptying on sunny Sundays.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ardwell House, 94 Evesham Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken arrow sign, 8th May
item.description:
This directional sign is bent over. A car may have hit it. This is often a problem. Does it need to be replaced with a more robust sign?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Alexandra Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: BTPhoneBox smashed on both sides on PE way, 8th May
item.description:
Can somebody come and tidy up a glass and alert British Telecom or whoever owns these boxes now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Cowper Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous paving slab, 7th May
item.description:
Paving slab is dangerous as it tips up when walked on its by the road signs and gate used by disabled people
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Isbourne Road, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Smashed drop curb at eight Brittan place, 7th May
item.description:
Smashed drop curb at eight Brittan place. Something heavy is broken this and loosen difference foundation so that it’s rocking and a bit of a trip hazard can somebody take a look at it?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 33 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
